Summary: The document provides instructions for registering for NUS Guest WIFI. Once successfully authenticated, the connection is valid for 24 hours. To access Classroom PCs, EEP participants can use the login credentials provided. To connect to NUS_Guest SSID, users must enter their mobile number, receive an OTP (One-Time-Pin), and agree to the Terms of Use. They must then enter the OTP and click Confirm to complete the registration process.
